In England, in the seven days to 21 April, there were 13,942 new confirmed cases (24.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 14 April, there were 15,272 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (1,330 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 26 April is 3,850,494 (6,840.8 cases per 100,000 population).
